HostProperties.tag: Linux Kernel 4.1.8-100.fc21.x86_64 on Fedora release 21 (Twenty One)

ReportItem.description:
This plugin runs 'netstat' on the remote machine to enumerate open ports.
See the section 'plugins options' to configure it.
ReportItem.synopsis: Remote open ports are enumerated via SSH.
ReportItem.plugin_output: Port 48039/udp was found to be open
